thread.title: Proteas ploy to stop Rohit Sharma: Get him out in first 10 deliveries
thread.title_full: Proteas ploy to stop Rohit Sharma: Get him out in first 10 deliveries - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Proteas ploy to stop Rohit Sharma: Get him out in first 10 deliveries
text:
*Indore*: Unbeaten in the tour they might be, but Indian batsman Rohit Sharma's form is giving South Africa sleepless nights and the Proteas are planning to get the marauding right-hander out of their way in the first 10 balls itself in the second ODI here tomorrow.
Aware of Rohit's destructive abilities, South Africa's ... Â»
